de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface ScrollableDialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnimateableDialog, AnimateableDialogDecorator, ButtonBarDialog, ButtonBarDialogDecorator, Dialog, android.content.DialogInterface, HeaderDialog, HeaderDialogDecorator, ListDialog, ListDialogDecorator, MaterialDialog, MaterialDialogDecorator, ScrollableDialogDecorator, ValidateableDialog, ValidateableDialogDecorator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScrollableDialog, MaterialDialog

    public interface ScrollableDialog
extends ListDialog, ScrollableDialogDecorator
    Defines the interface, a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content, must implement.
    Since:
    3.6.0
